You are assisting with an academic literature review on the topic: "{topic}".

Your task is to identify which of the following article {filter_by} are NOT relevant to {topic}.

ONLY return a list of dictionaries for irrelevant {filter_by}, using the format:
[{{"article_number": X, "justification": "..."}}]

Do NOT summarize or discuss relevant {filter_by}.
Do NOT provide overall synthesis or connections between article {filter_by}.
ONLY return the list of irrelevant {filter_by} with short justifications.
If no article is irrelevant, return an empty list.

---
{joined_entries}
